ok its like this guys G1 i thought was the best transformers even if it was 
off scale more then the others but i think most of the characters in G1 was 
cool especially since i have every transformer made so far yes from the 
beginning and the new ones of transformers in disguise.I have 4 of each one 
and i kept 2 in boxes  put 1 up 4 a model of each one and then 1 of each 2 
mess around with and the odd thing is im a girl yes a girl.My brothers also 
have transformers but was never really a fan till Beast Wars.I have japanese 
version of the shows and movies and the US version of them.
I'd just like to say im glad that i really didnt have to get involved in this 
fight.But i wanted to say one thing stop making stupid OOC posts please its 
no need to fight about the way it was are its flaws its sorta old and i dont 
like the complaints that somepeople are making.No names said though.So I 
think I'm done with this post.Oh except can my character be the leader of the 
Autobots please?
